name: Trigger a Direct Debit Payment Copy
fullName: Mocked Services/Direct Debit#Trigger a Direct Debit Payment Copy
descriptionHtml:
This endpoint is used to trigger a direct debit mandate transaction. For a transaction to be successful, the direct debit mandate must be in an active status and the customer must have funds to cover the entire amount .

The direct debit endpoint will not support partial debits - all transactions must succeed or fail as a whole.

### Request Body Fields
